sentences.sContent: Barr strongly disagreed with Kronfeld’s statement.
sentences.sCn: 巴尔强烈反对克龙费尔德的说法。

sentences.sContent: ...survey respondents disagree over whether this generation will follow in their parents，footsteps...
...About 68% of those surveyed disagree with the opinion that reading is boring or old-fashioned...
...Reasonable people may disagree about whom to blame...
...Female economists overwhelmingly disagree by a margin of 4-to-1...

synos.tran: 不同意；不一致；争执；不适宜

phrases.pCn: 消除分歧，求同存异；同意各自保留不同意见
在…方面意见不统一；对…意见不一

words.tran: 不愉快的；厌恶的；不为人喜的；难相处的；脾气坏的

trans.tranOther: to have or express a different opinion from someone else
